subject: College Athletics
Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Holy Cross’s Dominic Randolph passed for 347 yards and 3 touchdowns, but the Crusaders, playing in their first playoff game since 1983, lost at Villanova.
snippet: Holy Cross’s Dominic Randolph passed for 347 yards and 3 touchdowns, but the Crusaders, playing in their first playoff game since 1983, lost at Villanova.
